title: 689 people who won't be voting for Bush
body: <a href="http://photomatt.net/archives/2004/04/07/mosaic/">Bush Mosaic</a>, also <a href="http://amleft.blogspot.com/">here</a> and <a href="http://www.michaelmoore.com/index_hires.php">here</a> (from <a title="Synja" href="http://www.livejournal.com/users/synja/" >Synja</a>).  <a href="http://www.michaelmoore.com/words/message/index.php">Michael Moore has a good follow-up</a>.  I don't understand how people can still support that <a title="miserable failure" href="http://www.whitehouse.gov/president/gwbbio.html" >miserable failure</a>.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-16

689 people who won't be voting for Bush
